item_clarity.Name: Clarity
item_clarity.MainDescription: Use: Restores mana to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked,the effect is lost.
item_clarity.Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

item_gauntlets.Name: Gauntlets of Strength
item_gauntlets.Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

item_blades_of_attack.Name: Blades of attack
item_blades_of_attack.Lore: The damage of these small,concealable blades should not be underestimated.

item_blink.Name: Blink dagger
item_blink.MainDescription: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken,Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.
item_blink.AlternateDescription: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain. If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range,you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
item_blink.Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

item_magic_wand.Name: Magic Wand
item_magic_wand.MainDescription: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
item_magic_wand.AlternateDescription:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range. 
 Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
item_magic_wand.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies,it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

item_ring_of_basilius.Name: Ring of Basilius
item_ring_of_basilius.MainDescription:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. 
 Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. 
 Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
item_ring_of_basilius.AlternateDescription: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius,Ring of Aquila,or Vladmir's Offering.
item_ring_of_basilius.ExtraAttribute:
+ 7 Damage 
 AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65 
 AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
item_ring_of_basilius.Lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

item_glimmer_cape.Name: Glimmer Cape
item_glimmer_cape.MainDescription: Active: Glimmer - After a 0.6 second delay,grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
item_glimmer_cape.ExtraAttribute:
+ 20 Attack Speed 
 + 15% Spell Resistance 
 GLIMMER FADE TIME: 0.6 
 GLIMMER MAGIC RESISTANCE: 45% 
 GLIMMER DURATION: 5
item_glimmer_cape.Lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

item_lesser_crit.Name: Crystalys
item_lesser_crit.MainDescription: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
item_lesser_crit.Lore: A blade forged from rare crystals,it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

item_hood_of_defiance.Name: Hood of Defiance
item_hood_of_defiance.MainDescription: Active: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.
item_hood_of_defiance.AlternateDescription: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
item_hood_of_defiance.ExtraAttribute:
+ 8 HP Regeneration 
 + 30% Spell Resistance 
 BARRIER BLOCK: 325 
 BARRIER DURATION: 12
item_hood_of_defiance.Lore: A furred,magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

item_mask_of_madness.Name: Mask of Madness
item_mask_of_madness.MainDescription:
Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed,but causes you to take extra 25% damage.  Lasts 12.0 seconds. 
 Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. 
 Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_mask_of_madness.ExtraAttribute:
LIFESTEAL: 20% 
 BERSERK ATTACK SPEED: 100 
 BERSERK MOVE SPEED: 17% 
 BERSERK ADDED DAMAGE TAKEN: 25% 
 BERSERK DURATION: 12
item_mask_of_madness.Lore: Once this mask is worn,its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

item_energy_booster.Name: Energy Booster
item_energy_booster.Lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

item_broadsword.Name: Broadsword
item_broadsword.Lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights,this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

item_chainmail.Name: Chainmail
item_chainmail.Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

item_claymore.Name: Claymore
item_claymore.Lore: A sword that can cut through armor,it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

item_helm_of_iron_will.Name: Helm of Iron Will
item_helm_of_iron_will.Lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

item_javelin.Name: Javelin
item_javelin.Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

item_mithril_hammer.Name: Mithril Hammer
item_mithril_hammer.Lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

item_platemail.Name: Platemail
item_platemail.Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

item_quarterstaff.Name: Quarterstaff
item_quarterstaff.Lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

item_quelling_blade.Name: Quelling Blade
item_quelling_blade.MainDescription:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards. 
 Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units,based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
item_quelling_blade.AlternateDescription: Cannot carry more than one. Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Land Mines and Remote Mines.
item_quelling_blade.ExtraAttribute:
QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 140% 
 QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 115% 
 CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350 
 CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
item_quelling_blade.Lore: The axe of a fallen gnome,it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

item_faerie_fire.Name: Faerie Fire
item_faerie_fire.MainDescription: Use: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 HP
item_faerie_fire.Lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities

item_infused_raindrop.Name: Infused Raindrop
item_infused_raindrop.MainDescription: Passive: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone,the item disappears.
item_infused_raindrop.AlternateDescription: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
item_infused_raindrop.ExtraAttribute:
MANA REGEN: 0.85 
 MAGIC DAMAGE BLOCK: 120 
 INITIAL CHARGES: 5

item_wind_lace.Name: Wind Lace
item_wind_lace.Lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels

item_ring_of_protection.Name: Ring of Protection
item_ring_of_protection.Lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

item_stout_shield.Name: Stout Shield
item_stout_shield.MainDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_stout_shield.AlternateDescription: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
item_stout_shield.ExtraAttribute:
MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 16 
 RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 8 
 BLOCK CHANCE: 50%
item_stout_shield.Lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

item_moon_shard.Name: Moon Shard
item_moon_shard.MainDescription:
Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack. 
 Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 250 bonus night vision.
item_moon_shard.AlternateDescription: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
item_moon_shard.ExtraAttribute:
+ 120 Attack Speed 
 SHADE BONUS NIGHT VISION: 250 
 CONSUME ATTACK SPEED: 60
item_moon_shard.Lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

item_slippers.Name: Slippers of Agility
item_slippers.Lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

item_mantle.Name: Mantle of Intelligence
item_mantle.Lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

item_branches.Name: Iron Branch
item_branches.MainDescription: Active: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.
item_branches.Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch,its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

item_belt_of_strength.Name: Belt of Strength
item_belt_of_strength.Lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

item_boots_of_elves.Name: Band of Elvenskin
item_boots_of_elves.Lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

item_robe.Name: Robe of the Magi
item_robe.Lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user,but provides wisdom in return.

item_circlet.Name: Circlet
item_circlet.Lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

item_ogre_axe.Name: Ogre Club
item_ogre_axe.Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

item_blade_of_alacrity.Name: Blade of Alacrity
item_blade_of_alacrity.Lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

item_staff_of_wizardry.Name: Staff of Wizardry
item_staff_of_wizardry.Lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

item_ultimate_orb.Name: Ultimate Orb
item_ultimate_orb.Lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

item_gloves.Name: Gloves of Haste
item_gloves.Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

item_lifesteal.Name: Morbid Mask
item_lifesteal.MainDescription:
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. 
 Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_lifesteal.Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

item_ring_of_regen.Name: Ring of Regen
item_ring_of_regen.Lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

item_sobi_mask.Name: Sage's Mask
item_sobi_mask.Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

item_boots.Name: Boots of Speed
item_boots.MainDescription: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

item_gem.Name: Gem of True Sight
item_gem.MainDescription:
Passive: True Sight - Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range. 
 Dropped on death,and cannot be destroyed.
item_gem.Lore: Not one thrall creature of the depths,Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,Shall rest till seas,gem comes to sleep.

item_cloak.Name: Cloak
item_cloak.AlternateDescription: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
item_cloak.Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

item_talisman_of_evasion.Name: Talisman of Evasion
item_talisman_of_evasion.MainDescription: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_talisman_of_evasion.Lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

item_magic_stick.Name: Magic Stick
item_magic_stick.MainDescription: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
item_magic_stick.AlternateDescription:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range. 
 Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
item_magic_stick.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies,it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

item_ghost.Name: Ghost Scepter
item_ghost.MainDescription:
Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form,becoming immune to physical damage,yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage. 
 Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel  will not dispel Ghost Form.
item_ghost.AlternateDescription:
Ends if you become Spell Immune,and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune. 
 Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
item_ghost.ExtraAttribute:
+ 5 All Attributes 
 GHOST DURATION: 4 
 GHOST ADDED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
item_ghost.Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence,allowing them to evade physical damage.

item_enchanted_mango.Name: Enchanted Mango
item_enchanted_mango.MainDescription:
Use: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana. 
 Hold Control to use Enchanted Mango on an allied hero.
item_enchanted_mango.Lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

item_flask.Name: Healing Salve
item_flask.MainDescription: Use: Restores health to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked,the effect is lost.
item_flask.Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

item_dust.Name: Dust of Appearance
item_dust.MainDescription: Use: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
item_dust.AlternateDescription: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
item_dust.Lore: One may hide visage,but never volume.

item_bottle.Name: Bottle
item_bottle.MainDescription:
Use: Regenerate - Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked.  Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain.  Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use,and are activated automatically after 2 minutes.  If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier,the courier will move 30% slower. 
 Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero.  Stored runes cannot be shared.
item_bottle.Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages,the contents placed inside become enchanted.

item_ward_observer.Name: Observer Ward
item_ward_observer.MainDescription:
Use: Plants an Observer Ward,an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. 
 Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
item_ward_observer.Lore: A form of half-sentient plant,often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

item_ward_sentry.Name: Sentry Ward
item_ward_sentry.MainDescription:
Use: Plants a Sentry Ward,an invisible watcher that grants True Sight,the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards,to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes. 
 Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
item_ward_sentry.Lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

item_tango.Name: Tango
item_tango.MainDescription:
Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health. 
 Comes with 4 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
item_tango.AlternateDescription: Heals for double duration when used on a Ironwood Tree or Wards.
item_tango.ExtraAttribute:
EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED: 115 
 EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED: 230 
 EAT WARD CAST RANGE: 450 
 HEAL DURATION: 16
item_tango.Lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

item_courier.Name: Animal Courier
item_courier.MainDescription: Use: Deploy Courier - Deploys a creature to carry item to and from your team's base.
item_courier.Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

item_tpscroll.Name: Town Portal Scroll
item_tpscroll.MainDescription: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
item_tpscroll.AlternateDescription: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession,the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.

item_travel_boots.Name: Boots of Travel
item_travel_boots.MainDescription:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes. 
 Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_travel_boots.AlternateDescription: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.

item_phase_boots.Name: Phase Boots
item_phase_boots.MainDescription:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units.  The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged. 
 Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_phase_boots.ExtraAttribute:
+ 45 Movement Speed 
 + 24 Damage 
 PHASE MOVE BOOST MELEE: 24% 
 PHASE MOVE BOOST RANGED: 20% 
 PHASE DURATION: 2.5
item_phase_boots.Lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

item_demon_edge.Name: Demon Edge
item_demon_edge.Lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian,it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

item_eagle.Name: Eaglesong
item_eagle.Lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle,this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

item_reaver.Name: Reaver
item_reaver.Lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

item_relic.Name: Sacred Relic
item_relic.Lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

item_hyperstone.Name: Hyperstone
item_hyperstone.Lore: A mystical,carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

item_ring_of_health.Name: Ring of Health
item_ring_of_health.Lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

item_void_stone.Name: Void Stone
item_void_stone.Lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic,this ring pulses with energy.

item_mystic_staff.Name: Mystic Staff
item_mystic_staff.Lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

item_point_booster.Name: Point Booster
item_point_booster.Lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

item_vitality_booster.Name: Vitality Booster
item_vitality_booster.Lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

item_power_treads.Name: Power Treads
item_power_treads.MainDescription:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength,Agility and Intelligence. 
 Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength,Band of Elvenskin,or a Robe of the Magi.  Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack,nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
item_power_treads.ExtraAttribute:
+ 45 Movement Speed 
 + 9 Selected Attribute 
 + 25 Attack Speed
item_power_treads.Lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

item_hand_of_midas.Name: Hand of Midas
item_hand_of_midas.MainDescription: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
item_hand_of_midas.AlternateDescription:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty). 
 Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
item_hand_of_midas.Lore: Preserved through unknown magical means,the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed,sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

item_oblivion_staff.Name: Oblivion Staff
item_oblivion_staff.ExtraAttribute:
+ 6 Intelligence 
 + 10 Attack Speed 
 + 15 Damage 
 + 75% Mana Regeneration
item_oblivion_staff.Lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff,it is actually very powerful,much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

item_pers.Name: Perseverance
item_pers.Lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

item_poor_mans_shield.Name: Poor Man's Shield
item_poor_mans_shield.MainDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes,but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.
item_poor_mans_shield.AlternateDescription: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
item_poor_mans_shield.ExtraAttribute:
+ 6 Agility 
 MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 20 
 RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 10 
 CREEP BLOCK CHANCE: 53%
item_poor_mans_shield.Lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

item_bracer.Name: Bracer
item_bracer.Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

item_wraith_band.Name: Wraith Band
item_wraith_band.Lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

item_null_talisman.Name: Null Talisman
item_null_talisman.Lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

item_mekansm.Name: Mekansm
item_mekansm.MainDescription:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius. 
 Passive: Mekansm Aura - Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius. 
 Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
item_mekansm.AlternateDescription: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
item_mekansm.ExtraAttribute:
+ 5 All Attributes 
 + 5 Armor 
 AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4 
 RESTORE HEAL: 250 
 RESTORE ARMOR: 2 
 RESTORE ARMOR DURATION: 25 
 AURA/RESTORE RADIUS: 900
item_mekansm.Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

item_vladmir.Name: Vladmir's Offering
item_vladmir.MainDescription:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants lifesteal,health regeneration,mana regeneration,bonus attack damage,and armor to allies in a 900 radius.  The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged. 
 Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
item_vladmir.AlternateDescription: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius,Ring of Aquila,or Vladmir's Offering.
item_vladmir.ExtraAttribute:
+ 2 All Attributes 
 AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3 
 AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8 
 AURA BONUS ARMOR: 4 
 AURA BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 15% 
 AURA MELEE LIFESTEAL: 15% 
 AURA RANGED LIFESTEAL: 10% 
 AURA RADIUS: 900
item_vladmir.Lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

item_flying_courier.Name: Flying Courier
item_flying_courier.MainDescription:
Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier,granting it swift,unobstructed movement to carry item to and from your team's base. 
 Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
item_flying_courier.Lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

item_buckler.Name: Buckler
item_buckler.MainDescription: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes,30 seconds on units.
item_buckler.ExtraAttribute:
+ 5 Armor 
 + 2 All Attributes 
 ARMOR CAST RADIUS: 900
item_buckler.Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past,it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

item_pipe.Name: Pipe of Insight
item_pipe.MainDescription:
Active: Barrier - Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius. 
 Passive: Insight Aura - Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius.
item_pipe.AlternateDescription:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack. 
 Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
item_pipe.ExtraAttribute:
+ 8 HP Regeneration 
 + 30% Spell Resistance 
 AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4 
 AURA MAGIC RESISTANCE: 10% 
 AURA RADIUS: 900 
 BARRIER SPELL BLOCK: 400 
 BARRIER DURATION: 12 
 BARRIER CAST RADIUS: 900
item_pipe.Lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin,it creates barriers against magical forces.

item_urn_of_shadows.Name: Urn of Shadows
item_urn_of_shadows.MainDescription:
Active: Soul Release - Heals health over time to friendly units,but deals pure damage over time to enemy units.  The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower. 
 Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
item_urn_of_shadows.AlternateDescription:
Empty urns gain 2 charges. 
 If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them,it will refresh its duration.
item_urn_of_shadows.ExtraAttribute:
+ 50% Mana Regeneration 
 + 6 Strength 
 RELEASE ALLY TOTAL HEAL: 400 
 RELEASE ENEMY TOTAL DAMAGE: 150 
 SOUL RELEASE DURATION: 8 
 SOUL RELEASE CAST RANGE: 950
item_urn_of_shadows.Lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

item_headdress.Name: Headdress
item_headdress.MainDescription:
Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius. 
 Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
item_headdress.ExtraAttribute:
+ 2 All Attributes 
 AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3 
 AURA REGEN RADIUS: 900
item_headdress.Lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

item_sheepstick.Name: Scythe of Vyse
item_sheepstick.MainDescription: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
item_sheepstick.AlternateDescription: The target will have a base movement speed of 140,but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
item_sheepstick.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Strength 
 +10 Agility 
 + 35 Intelligence 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 HEX DURATION: 3.5
item_sheepstick.Lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse,it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

item_orchid.Name: Orchid Malevolence
item_orchid.MainDescription: Active: Soul Burn - Silences the target unit for 5.0 seconds. At the end of the silence,30.0% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.
item_orchid.AlternateDescription: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
item_orchid.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25 Intelligence 
 + 30 Attack Speed 
 + 30 Damage 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 SOUL BURN INCREASED DAMAGE: 30% 
 SOUL BURN DURATION: 5
item_orchid.Lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

item_bloodthorn.Name: Bloodthorn
item_bloodthorn.MainDescription:
Active: Silences a target for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and land a crit on impact. 
 Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
item_bloodthorn.AlternateDescription: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
item_bloodthorn.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25 Intelligence 
 + 30 Attack Speed 
 + 60 Damage 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 CRITICAL CHANCE: 20% 
 CRITICAL DAMAGE: 175% 
 SILENCE INCREASED DAMAGE: 30% 
 SILENCE DURATION: 5 
 SILENCE CRITICAL DAMAGE: 145%
item_bloodthorn.Lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

item_echo_sabre.Name: Echo Sabre
item_echo_sabre.MainDescription: Passive: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.6 second 100% movement and attack speed slow on each strike.
item_echo_sabre.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Intelligence 
 +10 Strength 
 + 10 Attack Speed 
 + 15 Damage 
 + 75% Mana Regeneration 
 MOVEMENT SLOW: 100% 
 ATTACK SLOW: 100% 
 SLOW DURATION: 0.6
item_echo_sabre.Lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

item_cyclone.Name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
item_cyclone.MainDescription: Active: Cyclone - Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone,making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
item_cyclone.AlternateDescription:
You cannot cyclone allies. 
 Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity. 
 Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
item_cyclone.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Intelligence 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 + 40 Movement Speed 
 CYCLONE DURATION: 2.5 
 CYCLONE CAST RANGE: 575
item_cyclone.Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages,its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

item_aether_lens.Name: Aether Lens
item_aether_lens.MainDescription: Passive: Increases spell cast range by 200 and spell damage output by 5%
item_aether_lens.ExtraAttribute:
+ 250 Mana 
 + 8 HP Regeneration 
 + 200 Cast Range 
 SPELL DAMAGE AMP: 5%
item_aether_lens.Lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath,the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

item_force_staff.Name: Force Staff
item_force_staff.MainDescription: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.
item_force_staff.AlternateDescription:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself. 
 Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions. 
 Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere,Duel,or Black Hole.
item_force_staff.Lore: Allows you to manipulate others,for good or evil.

item_hurricane_pike.Name: Hurricane Pike
item_hurricane_pike.MainDescription:
Active: When used on an enemy,it pushes you both away from each other 450 units each,and allows you to attack the target without range restrictions for 4 attacks for a maximum of 5.0 seconds. Grants 100 Attack Speed during the attacks. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies. 
 Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
item_hurricane_pike.AlternateDescription:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself. 
 Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions. 
 Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere,Duel,or Black Hole.
item_hurricane_pike.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Intelligence 
 +4 HP Regeneration 
 + 20 Agility 
 + 15 Strength 
 + 140 Range 
 UNLIMITED RANGE DURATION: 5 
 CAST RANGE ON ENEMY: 400 
 UNLIMITED RANGE ATTACKS: 4
item_hurricane_pike.Lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

item_dagon.Name: Dagon
item_dagon.MainDescription: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon.ExtraAttribute:
+ 13/16/19/22/25  Intelligence 
 + 3 All Attributes 
 + 9 Damage 
 BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800 
 CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
item_dagon.Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used,it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

item_necronomicon.Name: Necronomicon
item_necronomicon.MainDescription: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds,whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.
item_necronomicon.ExtraAttribute:
+ 15/21/24  Intelligence 
 + 8/12/16  Strength 
 WARRIOR HEALTH: 700/800/900 
 WARRIOR DAMAGE: 45/60/75 
 WARRIOR MANA BREAK: 25/50/75 
 WARRIOR LAST WILL DMG: 550/675/800 
 ARCHER HEALTH: 700/800/900 
 ARCHER DAMAGE: 60/90/120 
 ARCHER MANA BURN: 125/175/225 
 ARCHER AURA SPEED: 5%/7%/9%
item_necronomicon.Lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology,a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

item_ultimate_scepter.Name: Aghanim's Scepter
item_ultimate_scepter.MainDescription: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate,and some abilities,of certain heroes.
item_ultimate_scepter.Lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

item_refresher.Name: Refresher Orb
item_refresher.MainDescription: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your item and abilities.
item_refresher.Lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

item_assault.Name: Assault Cuirass
item_assault.MainDescription:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures,and decreases the armor of nearby enemies. 
 Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
item_assault.ExtraAttribute:
+ 35 Attack Speed 
 + 10 Armor 
 AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20 
 AURA ALLY BONUS ARMOR: 5 
 AURA ENEMY ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
item_assault.Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches,this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

item_heart.Name: Heart of Tarrasque
item_heart.MainDescription: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan,this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes,or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
item_heart.ExtraAttribute:
+ 45 Strength 
 + 250 Health 
 HEALTH RESTORED PER SECOND: 4.75%
item_heart.Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster,it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

item_black_king_bar.Name: Black King Bar
item_black_king_bar.MainDescription: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.
item_black_king_bar.AlternateDescription:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration. 
 Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
item_black_king_bar.Lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

item_shivas_guard.Name: Shiva's Guard
item_shivas_guard.MainDescription:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds. 
 Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius. 
 Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
item_shivas_guard.AlternateDescription:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900. 
 The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
item_shivas_guard.ExtraAttribute:
+ 30 Intelligence 
 + 15 Armor 
 AURA ATTACK SLOW: 45 
 BLAST DAMAGE: 200 
 BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40% 
 BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4 
 BLAST RADIUS: 900
item_shivas_guard.Lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess,today it retains much of its former power.

item_bloodstone.Name: Bloodstone
item_bloodstone.MainDescription:
Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die. 
 Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 12 charges,and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second,and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies,500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius,while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
item_bloodstone.AlternateDescription: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
item_bloodstone.ExtraAttribute:
+ 475 Health 
 + 425 Mana 
 + 9 HP Regeneration 
 + 200% Mana Regeneration
item_bloodstone.Lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield,as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

item_sphere.Name: Linken's Sphere
item_sphere.MainDescription:
Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 13.0 seconds. 
 Active: Transfer Spellblock - Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.
item_sphere.ExtraAttribute:
+ 15 All Attributes 
 + 6 HP Regeneration 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 + 15 Damage
item_sphere.Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

item_lotus_orb.Name: Lotus Orb
item_lotus_orb.MainDescription: Active: Echo Shell - Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.
item_lotus_orb.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Damage 
 + 10 Armor 
 + 6 HP Regeneration 
 + 125% Mana Regeneration 
 + 250 Mana 
 ECHO DURATION: 6 
 ECHO CAST RANGE: 900
item_lotus_orb.Lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

item_182.Name: Vanguard
item_182.MainDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_182.AlternateDescription: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
item_182.ExtraAttribute:
+ 250 Health 
 + 8 HP Regeneration 
 BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 32 
 BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 16
item_182.Lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

item_crimson_guard.Name: Crimson Guard
item_crimson_guard.MainDescription:
Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 55 damage from each incoming attack,along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds. 
 Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_crimson_guard.AlternateDescription:
Multiple sources of damage block don't stack. 
 Guard does not affect units that have been affected by Guard in the last 50 seconds.
item_crimson_guard.ExtraAttribute:
+ 250 Health 
 + 8 HP Regeneration 
 + 2 All Attributes 
 + 5 Armor 
 BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 32 
 BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 16 
 GUARD ARMOR: 2 
 GUARD DURATION: 10 
 GUARD RADIUS: 900 
 GUARD DAMAGE BLOCK : 55
item_crimson_guard.Lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

item_blade_mail.Name: Blade Mail
item_blade_mail.MainDescription: Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.
item_blade_mail.AlternateDescription:
Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction. 
 Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blademail. 
 Returned damage type is the same as it was received. 
 Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
item_blade_mail.ExtraAttribute:
+ 22 Damage 
 + 6 Armor 
 + 10 Intelligence 
 DAMAGE RETURN DURATION: 4.5
item_blade_mail.Lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail,it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

item_rapier.Name: Divine Rapier
item_rapier.MainDescription: Drops on death.  Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
item_rapier.AlternateDescription: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner,it cannot be dropped again except by death.
item_rapier.Lore: So powerful,it cannot have a single owner.

item_monkey_king_bar.Name: Monkey King Bar
item_monkey_king_bar.MainDescription:
Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun. 
 Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
item_monkey_king_bar.ExtraAttribute:
+ 66 Damage 
 + 15 Attack Speed 
 MINI-BASH CHANCE: 35% 
 MINI-BASH DAMAGE: 160
item_monkey_king_bar.Lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

item_radiance.Name: Radiance
item_radiance.MainDescription: Active: Toggle Burn - When active,scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them,causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.
item_radiance.ExtraAttribute:
+ 65 Damage 
 BURN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 
 BURN MISS CHANCE: 17% 
 BURN RADIUS: 700
item_radiance.Lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

item_butterfly.Name: Butterfly
item_butterfly.MainDescription:
Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4.0 seconds. 
 Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_butterfly.ExtraAttribute:
+ 35 Agility 
 + 30 Damage 
 + 35% Evasion 
 + 30 Attack Speed 
 FLUTTER BONUS MOVE SPEED: 35% 
 FLUTTER DURATION: 4
item_butterfly.Lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly,but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

item_greater_crit.Name: Daedalus
item_greater_crit.MainDescription: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
item_greater_crit.Lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

item_basher.Name: Skull Basher
item_basher.MainDescription: Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage,based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
item_basher.AlternateDescription:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash,however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar). 
 The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker,Faceless Void,Slardar,and Troll Warlord.
item_basher.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Damage 
 + 10 Strength 
 BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25% 
 BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10% 
 BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4 
 BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 85
item_basher.Lore: A feared weapon in the right hands,this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

item_bfury.Name: Battle Fury
item_bfury.MainDescription:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards. 
 Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units,based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan. 
 Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
item_bfury.AlternateDescription:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. 
 Cleave damage goes through spell immunity. 
 If multiple sources of Cleave are present,each Cleave's damage is applied separately. 
 Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Land Mines and Remote Mines.
item_bfury.ExtraAttribute:
+ 55 Damage 
 + 6 HP Regeneration 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35% 
 QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 160% 
 QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 125% 
 CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350 
 CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
item_bfury.Lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

item_manta.Name: Manta Style
item_manta.MainDescription:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability,while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds. 
 Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage,while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. 
 Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple item do not stack.
item_manta.AlternateDescription:
Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable. 
 Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
item_manta.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Strength 
 + 26 Agility 
 + 10 Intelligence 
 + 15 Attack Speed 
 + 10% Movement Speed 
 NUMBER OF IMAGES: 2 
 IMAGE DURATION: 20 
 MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE: 33% 
 MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 350% 
 RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE: 28% 
 RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%
item_manta.Lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

item_dragon_lance.Name: Dragon Lance
item_dragon_lance.MainDescription: Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
item_dragon_lance.Lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

item_armlet.Name: Armlet of Mordiggian
item_armlet.MainDescription: Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active,Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength,but drains 45 health per second.  You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated,nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
item_armlet.AlternateDescription:
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP,but you cannot die from the change. 
 The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds. 
 Activating or deactiving Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
item_armlet.ExtraAttribute:
+ 9 Damage 
 + 25 Attack Speed 
 + 5 Armor 
 + 7 HP Regeneration
item_armlet.Lore: Weapon of choice among brutes,the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

item_invis_sword.Name: Shadow blade
item_invis_sword.MainDescription: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends,or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active,you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to end the invisibility,you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts 14.0 seconds.
item_invis_sword.AlternateDescription:
Has a 0.3 second fade time. 
 If the invisibility ends without attacking,the bonus damage is lost.
item_invis_sword.ExtraAttribute:
+ 22 Damage 
 + 30 Attack Speed 
 SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14 
 SHADOW WALK DAMAGE: 175
item_invis_sword.Lore: The blade of a fallen king,it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

item_silver_edge.Name: Silver Edge
item_silver_edge.MainDescription: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends,or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible,you move 20% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target,disable their passive abilities,and reduce their damage output.
item_silver_edge.AlternateDescription:
Backstab cannot miss. 
 Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
item_silver_edge.ExtraAttribute:
+ 30 Damage 
 + 30 Attack Speed 
 + 15 All Attributes 
 SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14 
 BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 225 
 ENEMY DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50% 
 REDUCTION DURATION: 5
item_silver_edge.Lore: Once used to slay an unjust king,only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

item_sange_and_yasha.Name: Sange and Yasha
item_sange_and_yasha.MainDescription:
Passive: Greater Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds. 
 Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple item do not stack.
item_sange_and_yasha.ExtraAttribute:
+ 16 Damage 
 + 16 Strength 
 + 16 Agility 
 + 16 Attack Speed 
 + 16 Movement Speed 
 MAIM CHANCE: 30% 
 MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE: 26% 
 ATTACK SLOW MELEE: 26 
 MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED: 13% 
 ATTACK SLOW RANGED: 13 
 MAIM DURATION: 5
item_sange_and_yasha.Lore: Sange and Yasha,when attuned by the moonlight and used together,become a very powerful combination.

item_satanic.Name: Satanic
item_satanic.MainDescription:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds. 
 Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. 
  is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_satanic.ExtraAttribute:
+ 20 Damage 
 + 25 Strength 
 + 5 Armor 
 LIFESTEAL: 25% 
 UNHOLY RAGE LIFESTEAL: 200% 
 UNHOLY RAGE DURATION: 4.5
item_satanic.Lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

item_mjollnir.Name: Mjollnir
item_mjollnir.MainDescription:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies. 
 Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets,dealing 150 magical damage to each.
item_mjollnir.AlternateDescription:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second. 
 Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away. 
 Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
item_mjollnir.ExtraAttribute:
+ 24 Damage 
 + 80 Attack Speed 
 STATIC DURATION: 15 
 STATIC CHANCE: 20% 
 STATIC DAMAGE: 200 
 STATIC RELEASE RADIUS: 900 
 CHAIN CHANCE: 25% 
 CHAIN DAMAGE: 150 
 CHAIN TARGETS: 12 
 CHAIN LEAP RADIUS: 900
item_mjollnir.Lore: Thor's magical hammer,made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

item_skadi.Name: Eye of Skadi
item_skadi.MainDescription:
Passive: Cold Attack - Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged. 
 Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
item_skadi.AlternateDescription: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi,3 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
item_skadi.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25 All Attributes 
 + 225 Health 
 + 250 Mana 
 COLD MOVE SLOW: 35% 
 COLD ATTACK SLOW: 45 
 COLD MELEE DURATION: 5 
 COLD RANGED DURATION: 2.5
item_skadi.Lore: Extremely rare artifact,guarded by the azure dragons.

item_sange.Name: Sange
item_sange.MainDescription: Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.
item_sange.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Damage 
 + 16 Strength 
 MAIM CHANCE: 20% 
 MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE: 20% 
 ATTACK SLOW MELEE: 20 
 MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED: 10% 
 ATTACK SLOW RANGED: 10 
 MAIM DURATION: 4
item_sange.Lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon,seeking weak points automatically.

item_helm_of_the_dominator.Name: Helm of the Dominator
item_helm_of_the_dominator.MainDescription:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero,non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 350. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum,its base health will be raised to the health minimum. 
 Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. 
 Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_helm_of_the_dominator.AlternateDescription:
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated,the old one will die. 
 Selling or upgrading Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
item_helm_of_the_dominator.ExtraAttribute:
+ 20 Damage 
 + 5 Armor 
 + 3 HP Regeneration 
 LIFESTEAL: 15% 
 DOMINATED HEALTH MINIMUM: 1400 
 CREEP MOVEMENT SPEED: 350
item_helm_of_the_dominator.Lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

item_maelstrom.Name: Maelstrom
item_maelstrom.MainDescription:
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets,dealing 120 magical damage to each. 
 Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers,but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
item_maelstrom.ExtraAttribute:
+ 24 Damage 
 + 25 Attack Speed 
 CHAIN CHANCE: 25% 
 CHAIN DAMAGE: 120 
 CHAIN TARGETS: 4 
 CHAIN LEAP RADIUS: 900
item_maelstrom.Lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves,Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

item_desolator.Name: Desolator
item_desolator.MainDescription:
Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds. 
 Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_desolator.Lore: A wicked weapon,used in torturing political criminals.

item_yasha.Name: Yasha
item_yasha.MainDescription: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple item do not stack.
item_yasha.Lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

item_diffusal_blade.Name: Diffusal Blade
item_diffusal_blade.MainDescription:
Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy,removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. If cast on an ally,Purge removes most debuffs. 
 Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 40 mana from the target,and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 20 mana per attack from melee illusions and 10 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities. 
 Upgradable
item_diffusal_blade.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25/35  Agility 
 + 10/15  Intelligence 
 PURGE SLOW DURATION: 4 
 PURGE CAST RANGE: 600
item_diffusal_blade.Lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

item_ethereal_blade.Name: Ethereal Blade
item_ethereal_blade.MainDescription:
Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form,increasing any incoming magic damage they take,while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack.  Can be cast on self.  If the target is an enemy,it is also slowed,and takes 2.0x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage. 
 Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
item_ethereal_blade.AlternateDescription:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter. 
 Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage. 
 Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
item_ethereal_blade.ExtraAttribute:
+ 40 Agility 
 + 10 Strength 
 + 10 Intelligence 
 BLAST ENEMY MOVE SLOW: 80% 
 BLAST ENEMY DURATION: 3 
 BLAST ALLY/SELF DURATION: 4 
 INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
item_ethereal_blade.Lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature,it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

item_soul_ring.Name: Soul Ring
item_soul_ring.MainDescription: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.
item_soul_ring.AlternateDescription: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool,it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration ends,the extra mana is lost.
item_soul_ring.ExtraAttribute:
+ 3 HP Regeneration 
 + 50% Mana Regeneration 
 SACRIFICE DURATION: 10
item_soul_ring.Lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

item_arcane_boots.Name: Arcane Boots
item_arcane_boots.MainDescription:
Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero. 
 Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_arcane_boots.AlternateDescription: Does not work on Meepo clones.
item_arcane_boots.ExtraAttribute:
+ 50 Movement Speed 
 + 250 Mana 
 REPLENISH MANA RESTORE: 135 
 REPLENISH CAST RADIUS: 900
item_arcane_boots.Lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

item_235.Name: Octarine Core
item_235.MainDescription:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction - Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and item by 25%. 
 Passive: Spell Lifesteal - A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.
item_235.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25 Intelligence 
 + 425 Health 
 + 425 Mana 
 + 50% Mana Regeneration 
 COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 25% 
 HERO SPELL LIFESTEAL: 25% 
 CREEP SPELL LIFESTEAL: 5%
item_235.Lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

item_orb_of_venom.Name: Orb of Venom
item_orb_of_venom.MainDescription: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target,dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_orb_of_venom.ExtraAttribute:
POISON DAMAGE PER SECOND: 3 
 POISON MELEE SLOW: 12% 
 POISON RANGED SLOW: 4% 
 POISON DURATION: 4
item_orb_of_venom.Lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

item_blight_stone.Name: Blight Stone
item_blight_stone.MainDescription:
Passive: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 8.0 seconds. 
 Blight Stone is a Unique Attack Modifier,and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_blight_stone.Lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

item_ancient_janggo.Name: Drum of Endurance
item_ancient_janggo.MainDescription:
Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius. 
 Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to allies in a 900 radius. 
 Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
item_ancient_janggo.AlternateDescription: Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
item_ancient_janggo.ExtraAttribute:
+ 9 Intelligence 
 + 6 Strength 
 + 3 Agility 
 + 3 Damage 
 + 3 HP Regeneration 
 AURA ATTACK SPEED: 5 
 AURA MOVE SPEED: 5% 
 ENDURANCE ATTACK SPEED: 25 
 ENDURANCE MOVE SPEED: 13% 
 ENDURANCE DURATION: 6 
 AURA/ENDURANCE RADIUS: 900
item_ancient_janggo.Lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

item_medallion_of_courage.Name: Medallion of Courage
item_medallion_of_courage.MainDescription: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally,increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy,reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies. Armor reduction is halved against Roshan.
item_medallion_of_courage.ExtraAttribute:
+ 7 Armor 
 + 50% Mana Regeneration 
 VALOR ARMOR REDUCTION: 7 
 VALOR DURATION: 7 
 VALOR CAST RANGE: 1000
item_medallion_of_courage.Lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

item_solar_crest.Name: Solar Crest
item_solar_crest.MainDescription: Active: Shine - Temporarily removes the armor and evasion from Solar Crest. When cast on an ally it grants them 10 armor and 25% evasion. When cast on an enemy,it removes 10 of their armor and blinds them,causing them to miss 25% of their attacks. Cannot target magic immune enemies. Armor reduction is halved against Roshan.
item_solar_crest.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Armor 
 + 75% Mana Regeneration 
 + 25% Evasion 
 SHINE ALLY BONUS ARMOR: 10 
 SHINE ALLY EVASION: 25% 
 SHINE ENEMY ARMOR LOSS: 10 
 SHINE ENEMY MISS CHANCE: 25% 
 SHINE DURATION: 7 
 SHINE CAST RANGE: 1000
item_solar_crest.Lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

item_smoke_of_deceit.Name: Smoke of Deceit
item_smoke_of_deceit.MainDescription: Use: Upon activation,the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time.  Minimap icons will also be hidden.  Attacking,or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower,will break the invisibility.
item_smoke_of_deceit.Lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

item_tome_of_knowledge.Name: Tome of Knowledge
item_tome_of_knowledge.Lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

item_veil_of_discord.Name: Veil of Discord
item_veil_of_discord.MainDescription: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16.0 seconds.
item_veil_of_discord.ExtraAttribute:
+ 6 HP Regeneration 
 + 6 Armor 
 + 6 Agility 
 + 6 Strength 
 + 6 Damage 
 + 12 Intelligence 
 INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 25% 
 MAGIC WEAKNESS RADIUS: 600 
 MAGIC WEAKNESS DURATION: 16

item_guardian_greaves.Name: Guardian Greaves
item_guardian_greaves.MainDescription:
Active: Mend - Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies,and removes most negative buffs from the caster. 
 Passive: Guardian Aura - Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%,they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.
item_guardian_greaves.AlternateDescription: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
item_guardian_greaves.ExtraAttribute:
+ 55 Movement Speed 
 + 250 Mana 
 + 5 All Attributes 
 + 5 Armor 
 AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4 
 AURA ARMOR: 2
 AURA BOOST HEALTH REGEN: 15 
 AURA BOOST ARMOR: 15 
 AURA BOOST THRESHOLD: 20% 
 MEND HEAL: 250 
 MEND MANA RESTORE: 160 
 AURA/MEND RADIUS: 900
item_guardian_greaves.Lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

item_rod_of_atos.Name: Rod of Atos
item_rod_of_atos.MainDescription: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
item_rod_of_atos.ExtraAttribute:
+ 30 Intelligence 
 + 350 Health 
 CRIPPLE MOVE SLOW: 60% 
 CRIPPLE DURATION: 4
item_rod_of_atos.Lore: Atos,the Lord of Blight,has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

item_iron_talon.Name: Iron Talon
item_iron_talon.MainDescription:
Active: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP. 
 Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units,based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
item_iron_talon.AlternateDescription:
Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees. 
 Cannot target ancients.
item_iron_talon.ExtraAttribute:
QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 140% 
 QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 115% 
 CAST RANGE: 350 
 CAST RANGE ON WARDS: 450 
 +2 Armor
item_iron_talon.Lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

item_abyssal_blade.Name: Abyssal Blade
item_abyssal_blade.MainDescription:
Active: Overwhelm - Stuns a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity. 
 Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage,based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. 
 Passive: Damage Block - Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_abyssal_blade.AlternateDescription:
The stun is melee range. 
 Doesn't stack with other bashes. 
 The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker,Faceless Void,Slardar,and Troll Warlord.
item_abyssal_blade.ExtraAttribute:
+ 250 Health 
 + 15 HP Regeneration 
 BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 40 
 BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 20 
 + 10 Damage 
 + 10 Strength 
 BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25% 
 BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10% 
 BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4 
 BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 85 
 OVERWHELM STUN DURATION: 2
item_abyssal_blade.Lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss,this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

item_heavens_halberd.Name: Heaven's Halberd
item_heavens_halberd.MainDescription:
Active: Disarm - Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3.0 seconds on melee targets,and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets. 
 Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds. 
 Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_heavens_halberd.AlternateDescription: Disarm can only be removed with spell immunity.
item_heavens_halberd.ExtraAttribute:
+ 25% Evasion 
 + 25 Damage 
 + 20 Strength 
 MAIM CHANCE: 20% 
 MOVEMENT SLOW MELEE: 20% 
 ATTACK SLOW MELEE: 20 
 MOVEMENT SLOW RANGED: 10% 
 ATTACK SLOW RANGED: 10 
 MAIM DURATION: 4 
 DISARM RANGED DURATION: 5.5 
 DISARM MELEE DURATION: 3 
 DISARM CAST RANGE: 600
item_heavens_halberd.Lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon,allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

item_ring_of_aquila.Name: Ring of Aquila
item_ring_of_aquila.MainDescription:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. 
 Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. 
 Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
item_ring_of_aquila.AlternateDescription: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius,Ring of Aquila,or Vladmir's Offering.
item_ring_of_aquila.ExtraAttribute:
+ 10 Damage 
 + 3 Strength 
 + 9 Agility 
 + 3 Intelligence 
 AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65 
 AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
item_ring_of_aquila.Lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

item_tranquil_boots.Name: Tranquil Boots
item_tranquil_boots.MainDescription: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or are attacked,the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.
item_tranquil_boots.Lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer,this boot is not particularly reliable.

item_shadows_amulet.Name: Shadow Amulet
item_shadows_amulet.MainDescription: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.5 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
item_shadows_amulet.Lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.
